{{also|Sieben}} ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈziːbm̩/|/ˈziːbən/}} * {{audio|de|De-sieben.ogg|audio}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|de|gmh|siben}} or {{m|gmh|sieben}}, likely from {{der|de|goh|sib||a sieve}}. ====Verb==== {{de-verb-weak|siebt|siebte|gesiebt}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[sift]]; to [[sieve]] =====Conjugation===== {{de-conj-weak|sieb|gesiebt|h}} =====Related terms===== * {{l|de|aussieben}} * {{l|de|Sieb}} * {{l|de|Siebbein}} * {{l|de|Siebdruck}} * {{l|de|Siebröhre}} ===Etymology 2=== {{cardinalbox|de|6|7|8|sechs|acht|ord=siebte}} From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|sibun}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*sebun}}, from earlier {{m|gem-pro|*sebunt}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|de}} {{m|ine-pro|*septḿ̥}}. Compare {{cog|nl|zeven}}, {{cog|en|seven}}. ====Numeral==== {{head|de|numeral}} # [[seven]] {{gloss|numerical value represented by the Arabic numeral 7; or ''describing a set with seven elements''}} =====Related terms===== * {{l|de|Jahrsiebt}} * {{l|de|Siebenmeilenstiefel}} * {{l|de|Siebensachen}} * {{l|de|Siebenschläfer}} * {{l|de|siebte}} * {{l|de|siebente}} * {{l|de|siebtens}} * {{l|de|siebentens}} * {{l|de|Siebtel}} * {{l|de|siebter}} * {{l|de|siebzehn}} * {{l|de|siebzig}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} [[Category:German cardinal numbers]]
